DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test safety tolerability IMGN529 patient relapse refractory non-Hodgkin 's lymphoma ( NHL ) Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia ( CLL ) .
DOC.brief_title: IMGN529 Treating Patients With Relapsed Refractory Non-Hodgkin 's Lymphoma Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia
DOC.criteria: Relapsed refractory NHL include tumor type : Follicular lymphoma ( FL ) , marginal zone lymphoma ( MZL ) /mucosaassociated lymphoid tissue ( MALT ) , diffuse large Bcell lymphoma ( DLBCL ) , mantle cell lymphoma ( MCL ) , chronic lymphocytic leukemia ( CLL ) .
